User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Disallow pages that shouldn't be indexed
Disallow: /cart
Disallow: /buy
Disallow: /order-success
Disallow: /account
Disallow: /login
Disallow: /signup
Disallow: /forgot-password
Disallow: /404

# Allow product pages and collections to be indexed
Allow: /shop
Allow: /shop/*
Allow: /about
Allow: /privacy-policy
Allow: /terms-and-conditions

# Point to sitemap
Sitemap: https://originsbythesea.com/sitemap.xml

# Point to humans.txt
Host: https://originsbythesea.com
